name: Intersect MMORPG sandbox
description:
This is a simple MMORPG game.

This is not the full game it is just to show you a sample of some of the features and I will continue to develop this game.

----------IMPORTANT----------

This game is just a example so far and if you try to play the game and on the bottom-left it says the server is offline please put it in the comments so I can fix it!!

These are the controls for the game

W,A,S,D = movement

E = Attack/Interact

Q = block

Space = pick up item

F11 = toggle GUI interface
